issue.title: [Release] Gen apidocs step fails with multiple issues
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6018](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6018). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
JAVA_HOME is inproperly set to /opt/conda, this is resolvable by removing maven from the conda install step.

Node installed by apt is outdated, use conda to install it.

Generating apidoc for java takes a lot of time.

`npm run doc` still fails with missing modules
